reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 47/05: FEES FOR OPA'S 2005 FISCAL YEAR
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 47/05: FEES FOR OPA'S 2005 FISCAL YEAR
reg_info.act_under: Electricity Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur l’électricité

content.content: 1. (1) For the purpose of subsection 25.21 (7) of the Act, the established fees for the OPA’s 2005 fiscal year are $15,000,000. O. Reg. 47/05, s. 1 (1). (2) The IESO shall collect the fees established under subsection (1) and shall pay them to the OPA. O. Reg. 47/05, s. 1 (2). (3) Despite subsection (2), the IESO may pay the fees established under subsection (1) or a portion of them from amounts collected by it on or before December 31, 2004. O. Reg. 47/05, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) For the purpose of subsection 25.21 (7) of the Act, the established fees for the OPA’s 2005 fiscal year are $15,000,000. O. Reg. 47/05, s. 1 (1).

(2) The IESO shall collect the fees established under subsection (1) and shall pay them to the OPA. O. Reg. 47/05, s. 1 (2).

(3) Despite subsection (2), the IESO may pay the fees established under subsection (1) or a portion of them from amounts collected by it on or before December 31, 2004. O. Reg. 47/05, s. 1 (3).
